get_indices() And get_crypto()

Source: vignettes/get_indices_and_get_crypto.Rmd
get_indices_and_get_crypto.Rmd
library(financr)

This vignette is about financr::get_indices() and financr::get_crypto(). These functions offers the latest financial values of 41 world-indices and 100 crypto-currencies, respectively. These values are expressed in USD.

  • financr::get_indices() return a data.frame with the latest financial value of major world financial indices.
# World-indices values on their respective exchange places in USD ($)
indices <- get_indices()
str(indices)
#> 'data.frame':    41 obs. of  7 variables:
#>  $ symbol        : chr  "^GSPC" "^DJI" "^IXIC" "^NYA" ...
#>  $ name          : chr  "S&P 500" "Dow Jones Industrial Average" "NASDAQ Composite" "NYSE COMPOSITE (DJ)" ...
#>  $ price         : num  5633 41990 17450 19398 5132 ...
#>  $ change        : num  21.22 -11.8 150.6 2.42 25.74 ...
#>  $ change_percent: num  0.38 -0.03 0.87 0.01 0.5 0.61 0.02 -2.29 0.61 1.7 ...
#>  $ volume        : num  2.78e+09 5.15e+08 6.97e+09 0.00 0.00 ...
#>  $ currency      : chr  "USD" "USD" "USD" "USD" ...
#>  - attr(*, "n.currencies")= int 1
#>  - attr(*, "currencies")= chr "USD"
#>  - attr(*, "date")= Date[1:1], format: "2025-04-01"
#>  - attr(*, "crypto")= logi FALSE
  • financr::get_crypto() return a data.frame of 100 crypto-currencies values.
# Top 100 crypto-currencies latest values in USD ($)
krypt <- get_crypto()
str(krypt)
#> 'data.frame':    100 obs. of  13 variables:
#>  $ symbol                          : chr  "BTC-USD" "ETH-USD" "USDT-USD" "XRP-USD" ...
#>  $ name                            : chr  "Bitcoin USD" "Ethereum USD" "Tether USDt USD" "XRP USD" ...
#>  $ price                           : num  85227.82 1917.34 1 2.15 611.88 ...
#>  $ change                          : num  2.91e+03 9.38e+01 1.02e-04 7.04e-02 7.90 ...
#>  $ change_percent                  : num  3.53 5.15 0.01 3.39 1.31 1.35 0.01 5.78 3.76 -1.19 ...
#>  $ market_cap                      : num  1.69e+12 2.31e+11 1.44e+11 1.25e+11 8.72e+10 ...
#>  $ volume                          : num  2.81e+10 1.52e+10 5.83e+10 4.07e+09 2.08e+09 ...
#>  $ volume_in_currency_24hr         : num  2.81e+10 1.52e+10 5.83e+10 4.07e+09 2.08e+09 ...
#>  $ total_volume_all_currencies_24hr: num  2.81e+10 1.52e+10 5.83e+10 4.07e+09 2.08e+09 ...
#>  $ circulating_supply              : num  1.98e+07 1.21e+08 1.44e+11 5.82e+10 1.42e+08 ...
#>  $ X52_wk_change_percent           : num  26.13 -44.36 -0.05 256.96 9.88 ...
#>  $ from                            : chr  "BTC" "ETH" "USDT" "XRP" ...
#>  $ to                              : chr  "USD" "USD" "USD" "USD" ...
#>  - attr(*, "n.currencies")= int 101
#>  - attr(*, "currencies")= chr [1:101] "BTC" "ETH" "USDT" "XRP" ...
#>  - attr(*, "exchange")= chr [1:100] "BTC => USD" "ETH => USD" "USDT => USD" "XRP => USD" ...
#>  - attr(*, "date")= Date[1:1], format: "2025-04-01"
#>  - attr(*, "crypto")= logi TRUE
